1565207629_1EFZ3dYDWVpD4kF5H9PF83HjPAehE.body: I suspect that as people begin to realize they exist in a tightly censored and controlled digital landscape,  decentralized media will gain in prominence and there will be little they can do about it.  I do think that it will also take quite a while as these technologies are still pretty difficult to use.  ZeroNet and other blockchain based networks like LBRY and Steem still have a lot of growth too go through before the tipping point can occur.
